title: Iterative solution of linear systems in the 20th century

tldr.text: This paper sketches the main research developments in the area of iterative methods for solving linear systems during the 20th century, ending with the availability of large toolbox of specialized algorithms for solving the very large problems which arise in scientic and industrial computational models.
